path.style: fill: rgb(69, 69, 69); fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(69, 69, 69); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 10px;
fill: rgb(255, 82, 82); fill-rule: evenodd; mix-blend-mode: lighten; stroke: rgb(255, 82, 82); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 10px;
